name: Rave Digital
tagline: HELPING BUSINESSES IN THEIR BOTTOM LINE!
description:
We are a team of Certified Software Engineers. We provide customized web and mobile solutions.
We help businesses in their bottom line, by delivering quality technology services. We are a Magento Professional Solution Partner, Microsoft Silver Partner, Salesforce Partner, Dotmailer  Partner, and Google Partner. We primarily offer end-to-end e-commerce solutions to companies for launching and maintaining a professional online presence.
Our strong domain experience, technical expertise & quality-driven delivery model enables us to offer effective B2B & B2C e-commerce solutions, as well as CRM implementations to streamline your marketing efforts, giving a clearer view of your sales funnel and allowing you to provide effective post-sales support.
We cater to SMBs by signing up as their technology providers or vendors for their software needs. We do this by putting competent people to work and by leveraging our market experience.
We have in-house:
Magento Certified Developers (10) & Magento 2 Trained Solution Partner (6) 
Salesforce Certified Developers (15)
Google AdWords/Analytics & Bing Certified Professionals (15)
Microsoft Certified Professionals (3)
Zend Certified Developers (2)
Java Certified Developers (3)
Our five service areas of focus:
Ecommerce (Magento, Shopify, NetSuite SuiteCommerce, Zen Cart, WooCommerce, BigCommerce)
CMS (WordPress, Drupal, Joomla)
CRM (Salesforce, SugarCRM, NetSuite CRM, ZohoCRM, Microsoft Dynamic CRM)
Mobile Application (iOS, Android, Hybrid)
Digital Marketing (SEO, PPC, ORM, Mobile App Marketing)
Smart solutions and flawless execution on any platform is what we do.
